multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: rates; US core PCE rise and Fed dovish stance weigh on equity indices and 10‑year Treasury yields.

category.motivation: The article reports the US core PCE inflation figure, a major macroeconomic data release.

time_frame.motivation: The article reports a recent PCE reading and an immediate Fed rate‑cut signal that caused a day‑to‑day equity market reaction.

article_node.title: Stocks Decline on Weakness in Tech Stocks and Sticky Inflation Pressures
article_node.summary: US core PCE rose to 2.9% y/y in July, prompting Fed Governor Waller to signal a 25‑bp rate cut at the September FOMC, which weighed on equity markets – the S&P 500 fell 0.31% and the Nasdaq 100 slid 0.92% on the day.
